articles.title: US economy adds 678,000 jobs in February, jobless rate 3.8%: Govt
articles.description: Job gains were widespread, according to the Labor Department, led by the 179,000 new jobs in the leisure and hospitality sector that was hard-hit by the Covid-19 shutdowns and restrictions.
